faqs.question: What legal documentation should I verify before purchasing commercial space in Sector 4
faqs.answer: It is crucial to verify several key documents including the title deed and ownership chain ensuring the property is free from encumbrances. Our legal team assists clients in conducting exhaustive due diligence for every commercial property for sale.
